actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the treatment of intangible drilling and development costs as an item of tax preference.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude intangible drilling and development costs from the minimum tax on tax preferences.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the treatment of intangible drilling and development costs as an item of tax preference.
